Reviews.Title: Great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Justin Seeger
Reviews.Content: So far I have seen all the raccoons, skunks and cats that frequent my back yard. Last year I bought a deer sprinkler to keep the deer from eating my garden. Now I can see the deer get wet when they get too close to the garden. fun. The picture quality is good. The camera is easy to use. I mounted it to a tripod so I can place it anywhere. Only bad is when it fogs up sometimes during rapid temperature drop. well worth it's price!

Reviews.Title: Moultrie, a 'used to be' good name.
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: All of Moultries junk is now made in China.  I need not say anymore.  If you are lucky it will break down under warranty.  In most cases a few months after.

Reviews.Title: Won't honor warranty-Product doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Laurie K
Reviews.Content: I was given a Moultrie A-5 as a gift.  I have spent the last 2 weeks trying to get this device to work properly.  I found that it took pictures when I first set it up, but after it went to sleep, it wouldn't wake up to take pictures.  I have had no night pictures even though I tried to trigger it.  Now, the on/off display doesn't even work.  I called to find out about the warranty.  Moultrie will not honor the warranty without the receipt.  I don't have a gift receipt.  They also will not provide a shipping label to return the product.  Moultrie clearly does not value customer service.  I would not recommend buying any product from them.

Reviews.Title: Lasted three months
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: It worked well for three months and then the IR lights stopped working.  Apparently there is no return or exchange for this item after a month and a half according to Amazon.  Maybe they knew it was only good for a few months !  It was a gift for my Father and he enjoyed using it in his yard to see all the critters that visit at night.I am starting to rethink my relationship with Amazon after this and the upcoming rate hike.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price......but
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures in both daylight and night time with the IR flash.The only thing is it way to sensitive I have lots of "Nothing pictures" those are were doves have flow through the field.I'd also like to remove the name time and date off the pictures there is no way to remove it, couple of pictures I couldn'ttell what was in the corner Name date and time.I have it set for video, I'm worried I'll have 30 or 40  10 second videos of doves and that will be it.it takes a little longer to "wake up" then trigger as long as 3-4 seconds.I'll wait to see how the videos turn out

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: Cattle Queen "horsesdofly"
Reviews.Content: Busted my neighbor in the act. Time stamped and dated. Fantastic quality photos.2 day shipping.Load up and get several they work fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Lautz
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and use.  Does exactly what I wanted it too. Spotted the neighbors dog pooping on my lawn and have the time stamped photo to prove it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: stephen
Reviews.Content: I have not owned a lot of game cameras this is my first, but I am very happy with it so far.  Took a lot of pictures of nothing, not sure if it was my fault.  May have been branches blowing.  But it did take good pictures of deer.  I don't have any regrets and would buy again.  Have had in the field for a week went through one small rain storm and was fine so far.  Willl update if have any issues.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: Really impressed with this camera. Photos are very clear, day or night, very good range as well, have it set on low setting. This camera blows cameras that cost 3x as much off the map.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: John DeMeo
Reviews.Content: Does the job.  Easy to use.  Good value.  I got great photos of fox, coyote, and deer in my backyard.

Reviews.Title: When it worked, it worked fine
Reviews.Author: Richard Williams
Reviews.Content: It worked fine off and on. There was a glitch in the video recording, a hit and miss and you never knew if it was working or not when placed in the field. I got a lot of card reader errors when trying to view the images. What images it did take, were good. Had to send it back

Reviews.Title: Awesome Basic Camera
Reviews.Author: Roch Judice "Rochman"
Reviews.Content: This is very easy to program.  Takes thousands of pictures on one set of batteries.  Takes great pictures.  Tremendous value!!

Reviews.Title: Good PIctures & Video, but motion sensor is way too sensitive!
Reviews.Author: bpcoffee
Reviews.Content: Works ok, fairly good video or pictures, but man any little movement will trigger the camera. Need to go through hundreds of clips of moving grass to find a couple of clips with game in them.Now I can't find the firmware update on the Moultrie sight.I guess that's why it was on sale

Reviews.Title: Poor Instructions
Reviews.Author: White Oak Worker
Reviews.Content: This product works well. The motion sensor is effective and the pictures are adequate even in low light. The instructions, however leave something to be desired. Whoever wrote them seems to have assumed that you have been using game cameras your whole life. Also, buy a mounting kit.  The included strap does not hold the camera steady in moderate wind.

Reviews.Title: Moultrie camera
Reviews.Author: A. Sampley "murphydogpaws"
Reviews.Content: this camera is accurate snd has decent night pictures and very good day pictures...I would suggest it for a friend....nice camera

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal
Reviews.Author: Kristen Harrington
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and it is well loved. Easy set up and pictures are good. It was even used during a vacation to watch the back door.

Reviews.Title: Great Product at a great price
Reviews.Author: Brandie Creswell
Reviews.Content: This came just as it was pictured and was shipped quickly! It works great which I was skeptical about because the price was so resonable. I looked at several higher priced other models and this , I would say, has more functions and has a better picture.  I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: moultrie
Reviews.Author: alvin petteys
Reviews.Content: It didn't work from the first day,when I called Moultrie the lady told me different things to do and I had already done themI have two others that I use and no problems and I am familiar how to use themI got no help on returning it

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I received this camera a few days ago and am having fun with it. Lots of pics of deer and birds at our feeder, both day and night. For the price it takes great pictures (I have only used the low intensity setting) and works as expected. It's easy to pull out the SD card, plug it into your computer and view/post the pictures. It would be better if you could view, delete, etc from the camera but what do you expect for $55. This is great for the $$ but I'll spend more on one with more functions in the future.

Reviews.Title: Simply quits working (read the 1-star reviews!)
Reviews.Author: Cyndeb
Reviews.Content: I saw plenty of good reviews on this item before I bought it - but look closely and you'll see that those are mostly within a short period of time of purchase.  Those of us unlucky enough to have this item for several months have left all those negative reviews!  Simply put, the A5 quits working after one go-round and no amount of battery changes, changes in memory cards, or anything else I've tried will bring this "hunk of junk" back to life.  It gets one star for the original set of 200 photos, which included about 20 great photos of deer in our snowy backyard shortly after Christmas.  Since then, nada.  I get one photo of myself or my husband aiming the beam, then the camera apparently shuts down.  A complete waste of money and really disappointing for my kids.

Reviews.Title: For the price you can bet it.
Reviews.Author: miles
Reviews.Content: Stars out of box simple to set up take outstanding picture was really shock how good sharp pix are and the distance it took pix from. From mice to squirrel to deer to people well worth the prices. All deer trail camer you need my battery lasted for two months with average 450 pix every two days.

Reviews.Title: Defective Right Out of The Box
Reviews.Author: MrB
Reviews.Content: Would only take the 1st picture and no more after that, no matter the delay setting.  Tested fine when it was dark and used infrared, but totally useless during the day.

Reviews.Title: ok trail cam
Reviews.Author: LimaLima
Reviews.Content: The interface is incredibly simple but still baffled my technophobe friend. The IR lamps are much more noticeable at night than I expected, and don't shine as far as I'd like. It's also too large to use easily on humans indoors.

Reviews.Title: Works OK for the price
Reviews.Author: D. Ross
Reviews.Content: This unit does take decent pictures in the daylight, nighttime is OK considering the price. Mine arrived without the battery light indicator functioning so I contacted Moultrie, still waiting to hear back from them. The settings are basic, if one picture every minute, five or ten works for you, you will be satisfied. I wrongly assumed this could be programmed to snap pictures in a series but I don't find a setting for that. The infrared light is very noticeable by the way.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Chris Farrow
Reviews.Content: this camera is fine, its just not a good as the more expensive ones of course.  the sensor seems to be kind of weak, takes a while to get a picture and it seems to have to be within 20 yards to activate.  the shortest interval option is 1 minute.  id buy another because they are cheap but if you want to put on a large food plot or field then get another one.

Reviews.Title: And it fun!
Reviews.Author: Aloha
Reviews.Content: I use this to see what animals travel through my yard at night. Sensitivity: triggers about 12-18ft (approx.), image: both video and single images are good, night images: 8-10 feet after that it gets dark. Day images: look just like a digital camera with good depth of field (f16).Wind moving plants will trigger the camera.So far cats, skunk, possum. And they don't seem to notice the camera taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but keep looking
Reviews.Author: rossholly
Reviews.Content: The unit looks great, but crashed and burned after three hours of use. I spent some time with a helpful tech at Moultrie who offered a few suggestions to bring it back to life. She then suggested I send the unit in for warrantee repair. I let her know I was returning it period and shopping for a replacement. I settled on a D444 which is an amazing piece of equipment. My recommendation is give that camera serious consideration. It's a winner!

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: I have had only one other camera besides this one, so I don't know to much about them. What I do know and found out was this camera was easy to set-up, the instructions were clear, and the image resolution for 5mp was really good. All in all I really like this camera and will continue to use it in my arsenal.

Reviews.Title: Seems adequate for basic use
Reviews.Author: Michael Gasperi
Reviews.Content: This is my first trail camera and it seems adequate for basic use.  I've used it for a couple weeks.  It captured two deer at dusk and one racoon at night. I give it 4 stars due to its odd limit of 10 seconds of video and minimum of 1 minute delay.

Reviews.Title: Hunting Humans
Reviews.Author: JMurati
Reviews.Content: Bought this little gadget because I suspected unauthorized personnel were entering my office... The night, total dark feature was way cool, because, I work in a 24 hour operation and they were going into my office to sleep and look through my refrigerator. "BUSTED".

Reviews.Title: Great game camera.
Reviews.Author: C. Rathel
Reviews.Content: The Moultrie A5 Glow Game Camera is a very good camera for viewing wildlife.  I bought this for my grandson to use as a trail camera to see what's out there.  It works very well for the money.  He is thrilled at the pictures is takes and is constantly checking to see what new animal appears on the trail.  I would recommend this to anyone who is interested in getting started with trail cams.

Reviews.Title: Great for a Budget Camera
Reviews.Author: Jonathan B. James
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for use in the backyard and it serves its purpose well. The pictures were pretty clear and the motion detection seems to work well.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: James A. Skrentner
Reviews.Content: Placed two of these in the woods on Nov  7, it is now Jan 27 or about 80 days later. and in that time one of them took 2600 photos, and the batteries just now died.  I am really impressed.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and works
Reviews.Author: Tansey
Reviews.Content: These work. The big negative I give them; it seems Moutrie made the shutter trigger so slow that you miss stuff walking by. They could easily and cheaply fix that, but they want to upsell you. Beware, the shutter trigger is 2 seconds. Many shots often got the body of the deer and no head. These are perfect if you can point them at a feeder or looking down a trail. They suck a bit for cross traffic.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: JENNIFER MCNUTT
Reviews.Content: Good camera takes good pictures ,but there is one thing about it I don't like the delay should a little shorter.

Reviews.Title: Ok I guess
Reviews.Author: Wendy Cox
Reviews.Content: It does work most of the timedaytime pics were alrightNighttime picture quality is not greatbattery life is less than a monthnot a whole lot of settings to work withinstructions not real clear, make sure not to leave it in IR testing mode thinking it will be taking picsbackoff time of 1 minute is too longsurprised at how quick it filled up the SD cardnot sure about low glow, it emits distinctive red lights at nightthis might be a good entry level cam, but your way better off getting a higher quality one with more settings.

Reviews.Title: MOULTRIE A5 LOW GLOW GAME CAMERA
Reviews.Author: david molnar
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT & IT TAKES VERY GOOD PICTURES ,ALSO VERY EASY TO OPERATE WHEN U  GO TO USE IT IN THE RUFF

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Adrianne
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased 2 of these cameras for my husband for Christmas. He loves them. They have taken very clear pictures both day & night. We have caught clear pictures of Hog, Turkey, Deer, Rabbit, Bird & Squirrel. When the wind blows hard it does pick up on the movement & take pictures of nothing. Overall it does a good job. We have not tried the video part yet. It comes with a sturdy strap that keeps it from moving & is very easy to set up. I would recommend this camera. For the money you can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: Interesting Device
Reviews.Author: Radar ORiley
Reviews.Content: I get about 3 weeks of battery live.  The daytime photos are clear, and the nighttime photos are OK.  All of the pictures have a black strip at the bottom advertising the camera, and providing the date and time that the photo was taken.  I put it in my front yard, and it got triggered by people walking their dogs, but not by birds at the bird feeder.  On a sunny day, it seems to get triggered frequently by changes in shadows.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: GlockFan
Reviews.Content: These were my first trail cameras and, at this price, a great way to start monitoring deer activity.  For that, they are perfect.  They are inexpensive enough you can buy a bunch of them and good enough to start capturing lots of images.  This was really informative and I learned as much about where the deer were as much as where they were not.Maybe I am still learning how to position them, but I got a ton of "false positives"; pictures of shadows in the fields or woods.  I am sure there is a reason that is not necessarily based on the technical attributes of the camera.Getting the SIM card out when your hands are cold can be difficult.  Other than that, no complaints for the money.

Reviews.Title: to slow
Reviews.Author: Mark whitney
Reviews.Content: This cameras fasts shutter speed is every 60 sec so it only takes one pic every minute not seconds.Way to slow you miss way to much , not good !!

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: reno forney
Reviews.Content: I've only used it once and it was at night and worked better than I could imagine. The video was clear and crisp and the setup was simple and fast. Should of got this product years ago.

Reviews.Title: Blurry pics!
Reviews.Author: Sherry bruce
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my 14 year old son! For his first game camera it's ok! But the pics are pretty blurry! Not so bad that u can make out what's in them but pretty blurry!

Reviews.Title: a little disapointed
Reviews.Author: christian dungan
Reviews.Content: this is ok...barely...the price is what motivated me to buy this...size and battery life are good, picture quality leaves something to be desired

Reviews.Title: Game cameras
Reviews.Author: James Hagan
Reviews.Content: I have several other Moultrie cameras. Older models and have been very pleased with them.  This rascal will take 100 pics of nothing in one day.  I have discussed with Moultrie as it is still under warranty.  They described a procedure which is supposed to correct this issue which I will try later this week, otherwise if that does not work they asked I ship it back for repairs or replacement. I was advised not to mix SD cards between this camera and other cameras as that may be the source of some confusing software which caused the camera to take a pic every 1 or 2 minutes regardless of motion. I personally think it is a light issue as it happens at certain sun positions.  Regardless, it is a little extra pain to keep the SD cards separate for this camera as I have 6 other moultrie cameras which work fine.  They also steer me away from PNY SD cards. Say use only ScanDisk.  This camera should not be so picky. Makes it a pain.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Slimjde "There is a place for all gods creatu...
Reviews.Content: This is the first trail camera that I have bought for my father. For the price you can’t beat it and it works really well. It takes decent pictures in the dark and better pictures during the day. I haven’t tried the video option yet but I am sure its function works just as well. I put it up and checked it three days later and I had over 60 pictures from deer, raccoons to even blue jays flying 20 feet from the camera. We even have one picture of the deer’s eyes right up in front of the camera so I am not sure why the comments below about the animals acting surprised, I even walked out to retrieve the camera (at night) for my dad not knowing where he put it, never seen a flash as described below since it’s an IR flash but when I reviewed the pictures there I was, walked right past it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera good price
Reviews.Author: Alex Smith
Reviews.Content: Great camera, but perhaps a little too sensitive.Every spider web that glinted in the sun got a video clip.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I've had this for a few weeks and it's working great so far.  I'm sure there are better trail cameras out there, but for an entry level it's great.

Reviews.Title: Wish I'd gotten one of these years ago.
Reviews.Author: David K. Porter
Reviews.Content: Very Nifty, easy to set up, remarkably clear photos.I've got it in my back yard, overlooking a small water feature, and wanted to see what came tovisit at night.  Lo and behold, all kinds of wondrous things happen while we're sleeping.Fascinating, and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Brian Hutchens
Reviews.Content: Great pics and sensitive camera, leaves would set it off.If your buying a game cam just for deer hunting you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Get these before they raise the price!!
Reviews.Author: Clayton R. Anderson "CheapRudy"
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these in around the beginning of October to monitor deer activity. This camera takes very good pictures, both night and day, and is still on the original set of batteries here in the beginning of December, with over 5000 pictures taken so far. I have been so impressed that I ordered two more last week. They are just as good as the first. I now have two taking still shots and one taking the 10 second video clips. The video is good quality as well. The only negative I have found is that they tend to take a lot of 'false movement' shots. These shots are triggered by the shadows of tall trees during a very bright sunny day. Other than that, I have had ZERO issues with this camera. And for the price, I don't think it can be beat.Jan 15 2014 Update. Original camera is still taking pictures....on the original set of Duracell Procell batteries. Over 10000 pics now. Video mode does tend to use them up faster, but the time and file size of each clip is much larger than pics. Still very satisfied with these cameras for the money. Too many reviews on here about low quality photos, pics of nothing, etc. Its all about how you set them up and where. And for 50 bucks ~ , stop complaining!!!!

Reviews.Title: Works well and inexpensive.
Reviews.Author: wdilworth
Reviews.Content: Motion detector and infrared flash work great.  First night we caught a ton of wildlife at the feeder.  Looking forward to reviewing many more images.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Price
Reviews.Author: sksstallard
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday present for my son.  He loves it!  What a great find and a great price!  Very Happy!!!

Reviews.Title: Good quality but wish LED works better
Reviews.Author: gxu
Reviews.Content: I captured loads of wild life videos on my property with this camera: [...] The only problem is that the LED night light does not turn on every time the cam is in action, so I end up with many clips of dark nothingness. But It does work beautifully once the LED fires up. Worth the money overall.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, however Moultrie does not allow their products to work together
Reviews.Author: review2
Reviews.Content: Cameras worked great for first night of pitcures, then used Moultrie Photo Viwer to look and delete, replaced SD card and camera reads FULL.  Called Moultrie customer service, they did not make these cameras compatible with THEIR own viewers from last year.  Their solution buy a new viewer for $100.  This is not listed anywhere on camera. Returning and going with WildGame Innovations game camera.  Have 5 other Moultrie cameras that work with viewer,for $100 can get almost two cameras.  Make your products work together.  Camera great, moultrie not.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective trail camera
Reviews.Author: jpd
Reviews.Content: Cost effective trail camera with all the basic functions I needed. Purchased one to try out and then bought two more. Very satisfied with the pictures, battery life and how it functions after 3 months. Waiting to see how it does over a longer time period.

Reviews.Title: cheaper is not better
Reviews.Author: Robert Edwards
Reviews.Content: poor quality. only takes one picture per minute. if a doe walks by, followed by a buck, you wont get pictures of the buck. keeps deleting all pictures on sd card everytime i take it out. spend the extra money and get what you pay for. i recommend bushnell hd trophy cam

Reviews.Title: great pics
Reviews.Author: Gregory Gervais
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the quality of the pictures, day and night.  This camera is hard to beat for the same money

Reviews.Title: Night time wash out...
Reviews.Author: tcfeet
Reviews.Content: Takes great daytime pictures but night time it sucks... I even placed it in my yard where there is no lighting to test; Walked in front of camera at 30, 20, and 10 feet. In all three pictures I could not tell who I was. Every one was like a "white out"... Would not recommend this camera for night-time shots.....

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A5
Reviews.Author: Philip
Reviews.Content: 5 MP is more than enough for scouting hogs or deer.  When the camera snaps a pic of a deer 30 feet away, then another picture of a different deer 30 feet away, there is plenty enough detail to distinguish there are 2 different deer.  All I really wanted was something that would show me when the hogs were showing up late at night.  This does just that, and some.

Reviews.Title: Better and cheaper then security cameras
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: We had some local kids taking solar lights out of our front yard, they got bolder getting closer to our front door to do it and we decided to go get "cameras" We went to the local Best Buy- saw the prices and said NO WAY! So we went to the local hunting store and got one of these (we paid alot mroe at the loca lstore) It works great! So we found this (the SAME one) for MUCH LESS and Im thinking about buying a third one. Hubby designed a metal braket to mount it wherever he wants (its set up to put almost anywhere) and we love it. Can take pics or short videos. We have one at the front door and another at the back door. If we go on vacation- we'll see what happened when we were gone. Takes great pics and videos too. Night vision is also good.

Reviews.Title: Good game camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey W. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Good product, a little challenging to set up but once we got it going, it has been a work horse!  Quickly arrived.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA
Reviews.Author: A. Kuncken
Reviews.Content: This camera works as described, I leave it out in the rain and it still takes snapshots of passing folks and cars.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: The photos on this model are just fine for my purpose. I have it inside a barn to see what kind of critters are coming in at night. It's easy to get the sd card in and out, unlike another model I own.I'd recommend for the price alone.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Gooch
Reviews.Content: We bought one awhile ago and have had great success with it.  We just purchased to more and have not had such good luck. Not sure if it the cameras, memory cards or the digital viewer.  Still working with them.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price !
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Spires
Reviews.Content: This little camera is a great one for the price--easy to set up and easy to use, I think I'll order a few more !

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A5 game camera
Reviews.Author: magsdad
Reviews.Content: Item works great as described. There are better cameras with wider field of view and better long distance but their cost is much higher. This camera is very economical for a basic no frills low glow camera.

Reviews.Title: I am very pleased with this camera/
Reviews.Author: Rod Ressie
Reviews.Content: Took awhile for a animal to show up but when the wolf came I got a good picture of it at midnite.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Rogalny
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful for what I purchased it for (to take photos of a stray dog I am trying to trap).  Since I can't stay up all night waiting for her, this camera has taken shots every night indicating what time and the shots are pretty good for black & white.  The only reason I gave this four stars instead of five is that I wish it came with a longer strap.  In addition to the strap, I am also using bungee cords.  Otherwise, I am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.
Reviews.Author: LovesReading
Reviews.Content: This has been a very good camera so far. I thought I would want the closest interval between pictures to be less than one minute. But I think one minute is the perfect interval. Pictures are good whether in sunlight or at night. Good quality at a great price. Good battery life so far.

Reviews.Title: Ideal game/surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: craigery
Reviews.Content: This device can also be used to monitor two-legged intruders, particularly back doors or areas not normally trafficked.Great battery life; high megapixel pictures.  It uses up to a 32 GB memory card -- it actually will not operate without a memory card.  Also, it is in camouflage colors -- one competing brand is completely black, fairly easy to spot.The cheapest on the block, what more does one want? ---

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and took great pictures
Reviews.Author: T. Rose "Roseman"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on recommendation from a friend.  I was looking for a lower cost unit, easy to use, with decent image quality.  I was heading out to a country cabin on an annual vacation.  The unit was perfect for what I wanted.So why not 5 stars, you ask?  While I am completely satisfied with the purchase, I think anyone who will be using this in anything more than occasionally will want a few more bells and whistles.  For example, the minimum of a 1 min delay is to limiting.  And I wonder about rain getting inside to the battery housing.But if you want something as a first camera, or as an occasional use unit, I think this unit is great.

Reviews.Title: These things kick butt
Reviews.Author: sheepdog
Reviews.Content: The price is so right on these things.  I mostly use them for security cameras around my property and they are great.  Reliable, easy to use, durable, etc. You have to be pretty close for facial recognition, but license plates are easier to pick up.  I have used them for filming my night hunts too. I got a great video of a 200lb pig dropping in its tracks right in front of this camera.  Nice footage, impressed the friends.

Reviews.Title: Pro: Great quality pics from a distance. Con: There's no sensitivity setting.
Reviews.Author: Roger L Miller
Reviews.Content: Pro: Great quality pics from a distance. Con: There's no sensitivity setting. Other models and brands have this sensitivity setting, and I've found it very useful. If this setting is important to you, look for a different model. The picture quality is real good, and I was able to move the camera back from the target site and get a similar effect.The screen that shows the number of photos taken is. It visible until you unlock/open the door. Again,  not a big deal but if you are looking for this convenience be aware this model is not visible.The battery contacts are the type that can easily break if corroded or rusted, so take care to ensure they stay dry.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Emily Curtis Walker
Reviews.Content: Green Canyon was really good about shipping me the Low Glow game camera that was for my husband.It really worked well outdoors and we ordered in Monday where it arrived Friday,They were good to answer my questions too. We use this company often and like the service

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A5
Reviews.Author: David Crane
Reviews.Content: Awesome trail camera getting more can't beat the price. The still shots look great for a 5 mgp camera even at low or no light.  Also Amazon shipped really fast great service.

Reviews.Title: Hubby's Gift!
Reviews.Author: Samantha Prior
Reviews.Content: So far so good - I would recommend getting the memory chip to go with it... It's given good quality pic's!... we haven't tried all the setting yet, but we've found this one and it seems to work, so why change it!

Reviews.Title: Our new farm friend
Reviews.Author: Marci Smith
Reviews.Content: We keep this camera set up near our sheep pasture to monitor predators. It's a great camera for the money. We've been using it for about a month. Seems just right in terms of sensitivity. The only thing I've noticed is it will take a lot of photos a minute apart for up to an hour (60 photos...we have it set for one minute intervals) for no apparent reason. But is mostly triggered correctly from an animal wandering by. I think we'll purchase a few more in the future to set up on other parts of the ranch.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Teddy S.
Reviews.Content: Works great. Great Price. Something was digging holes in my yard at night. Now I know what. A coon digging for grubs. And, I have some great pictures of deer grazing in my yard. Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: christmas
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: Bought this as christmas present. They loved it. Did more than i thought. He made him tell him how much i paid for it. He was impressed with the price :)

Reviews.Title: Totally awasome
Reviews.Author: Gene Trinkler
Reviews.Content: It did exactly as described, took the pictures of the activity in my driveway, day and night, showed our deliveries, etc.  Gene

Reviews.Title: Very Reliable
Reviews.Author: Jean A. Weathers
Reviews.Content: We have several of these cameras situated throughout our front and back yards.  It is so awesome watching videos of the family of deer, coyotes, rabbits, and raccoon that frequent our yard day and night even though we are in the City!. It's also helpful to see who (and what) approaches our front door while we are away.

Reviews.Title: Works.....barley.
Reviews.Author: Mike M. "mm"
Reviews.Content: You can dance around in front of this camera at night and it will never take a picture. You need to be within 5 or 10 feet during the day for it to snap a picture.

Reviews.Title: LONG WAIT TIME BETWEEN SHOTS
Reviews.Author: Diver
Reviews.Content: Be aware that this has an insanely long wait time between each shot ie minimum of 30 seconds.  Quality of camera was a little lacking as well.  If you want relatively rapid snap shots for motion do not get this camera.

Reviews.Title: A Good Buy for the Price
Reviews.Author: M. Formica
Reviews.Content: Like all game cameras, these were overpriced when they came out.  But technology quickly catches up, and the A5s were available on amazon at a great price.  I lost a couple of older cams to weather related flooding, as well as one to theft, and so the need for a new cam was there.  THe batteries are expensive, relatively speaking, but the picture quality is a vast improvement over the other 5 cameras I had in my arsenal.  I was very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Robert Thomas
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone that wants a camera that offers outstanding performance at a reasonable price. well worth the money. pictures are clear and undistorted with excellent range.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with it so far.
Reviews.Author: Sandy Kubasczyk
Reviews.Content: Got this because I knew we were having a big animal coming around the house.  At 2;00 a.m. saw what was visiting us.....A German Shepard.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ross Neal
Reviews.Content: For $60 and the cost of an S Card it was a very good deal.  The picture quality is as good as my other camera that cost more.

Reviews.Title: works great, decent price
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I like this because its easy to set up, and easy to recover images. The images are good quality. The price on this was much lower than I shopped elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: best buy
Reviews.Author: amos anderson
Reviews.Content: this camera is good. for the money u can't beat it. just needs a nite or day selector. very durable.

Reviews.Title: Loving it.
Reviews.Author: Troy H.
Reviews.Content: Takes very clear pics and blends in very well. It helped me catch the person that was letting their dog do its business in my driveway. Now on to find out if there is a skunk living under my shed.

Reviews.Title: AWSOME for the price
Reviews.Author: Steve P. Edwards Jr. "Steve"
Reviews.Content: there is some negativity about this camera, but for the price i have NOT had a problem with it.  I have many cameras and this one is one of my favorites.  5 STARS from me...

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Great cameras!! Worked well all season.... They take great pics and video option is cool... I would recommend this item

Reviews.Title: Game Camera
Reviews.Author: Good Company "Elly"
Reviews.Content: Works great straightline, but  the periphial view is not very good. I really needed another type with a swivel head,

Reviews.Title: TOTAL PITA, NO PHOTOS WHEN MOVEMENT IS DETECTED- ! HORRIBLE INSTRUCTIONS
Reviews.Author: Jay Wimer "Jaybawb"
Reviews.Content: I opened the box, put in the brand new Duracell batteries, tried in vain to decipher the tiny print in the "manual", and the virtually illegible tiny grey on grey words next to the buttons. Finally found the manual in a PDF online.So I set the switch to "IR" as the manual said.  Light  flashed but took no pictures. After a minute or so it turned itself off and no amount of movement  makes the red light flash again. So I re-reads the manual.AHA!!It says the light will flash when motion is detected, but nothing about taking any pictures. Apparently you can only set it to "time delay", which I finally deduced means time between pictures. I don;t want that. I want it to take a photo when it sees some movement.  Why in blazes would anyone want to sift through 10,000 photos to find the one that actually shows any action???I'm beyond 'disappointed". I'm fed up with shoddy manufacturers that foist totally unusable electronic CRAP on the poor unsuspecting consumer AND CAN'T TAKE THE TROUBLE TO WRITE A MANUAL THAT MAKES ANY SENSE.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Catwoman "Quality Seeker"
Reviews.Content: This was easy to get up and running! The pictures and video are just what I needed. Highly recommend! Fast shipping too. Got it in record time. Thanks!Using for home security!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: babesdad
Reviews.Content: Having a great time watching the wildlife that passes through the night. Takes movies in the complete darkness, that look like daylight.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: Set up outside, rained couple days later, rain leaked into camera. Was told by moultrie "well they are not waterproof" I told them ants also gained entry, was told "this is not under warranty". So if you want an inside game camera maybe......outside camera you better pass

Reviews.Title: Cheap peice of junk
Reviews.Author: Rleigh16
Reviews.Content: Camera does not pick up small animals, ie. fox, squirels etc. Do not buy this item, Its not worth the price

Reviews.Title: Game camera
Reviews.Author: Earle Dashiell
Reviews.Content: produced adequate pictures as described.worked fine as advertised. instructions could be a little better, but not bad.good value for price

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A5 game camera
Reviews.Author: mammasawnT "MMO T"
Reviews.Content: This suits our needs in getting pics/vid of what lurks on our property at night.  Not overly impressed with the range etc. but if does pretty much what it's advertised to do.  I got it on sale so I'm good with that.

Reviews.Title: Let's call it 4 1/2 stars.
Reviews.Author: MF48 "Megafan48"
Reviews.Content: I'll start off by saying that I also own a Browning Recon Series 8MP trail camera so I'll make a few comparisons.  Let's start with the price.  This is considerably cheaper than that camera and, consequently, it has way fewer features.  Let's talk about the performance.Photos: The photos are quite good and very constrasty.  The resolution is good.  Are you ready for the bombshell?  The photos from this camera are better than those from the 8MP Browning.Range: The range is OK but I wouldn't say it's as deep as the box says it is.Sensitivity: In my estimation, this camera is way way to motion sensitive.  Sure, you won't miss an animal, but you will also have to sort through hundreds of photos of shifting shadows.  That's tedious.  The videos, by virtue of the surrounding darkness, do not trigger as easily so you'll have just the right amount.Glow:  It's about what you'd expect for a low-glow camera.  All the animals notice it, but I'd guess that most people  wouldn't notice it at night unless they were looking right at it.Video: Really good.  When you consider how little this camera costs, really really good.Only one complaint other than the sensitivity:  The strap "hooks" in the back are just cheap plastic and by tightening the camera down to a tree I managed to crack one of them.  That's unfortunate given that I've only owned it for 2 months.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price..
Reviews.Author: Duck Hunter
Reviews.Content: I've had it out for 4months still running on the same batteries.. Took over 2000 pictures... Night time you can tell what your looking at out to 30ft.. best pictures 3-12 feet...not the greatest pictures.. but if your like me your just using it to know whats feeding in the area.. Great entry level camera.

Reviews.Title: Way too sensitive
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This thing is way way way too sensitive!  Takes tons of "ghost" pics on windy days.  I even put it in areas where there are no branches or ferns, etc. to blow around and I still get ghost pics of the slightest small branch or rain or snow setting it off.  Totally annoying to have to delete a couple hundred pics of nothing to get the few actual critter pics.

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A5 Trail camera
Reviews.Author: Linda S. Johnson "Linda J"
Reviews.Content: We got this as a replacement to a unit that takes double AA batteries.  I love the pictures and it uses the C cell batteries.

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A5 Low Glow Game Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Rogers
Reviews.Content: Have had this for months in use even through the past cold winter misery we had in the south and still works. Takes good pictures and battery life is longer than that of some other brands. I wrote to moultrie because of worry of cold temps and operation range and the info they gave me said it would work and it did, the rayovac batteries i had in it didn't die as well! overall for low budget this worked good.

Reviews.Title: Great Game Pics
Reviews.Author: Sannie
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my son-in-law & I am not an expert on this type of camera.  My son is the outdoor person & he is the one that told me that this is the camera that I needed to get.  When it was Christmas time to open presents I only know that my son-in-law was very glad that I listened to my son.  He could not wait to go out & set up the camera in the woods.

Reviews.Title: Great buy.
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: Best value out there! I own six and will own ten for next year. Will probably sell my old cams.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lino melchor
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical when I bought these cameras. As the saying goes......... You get what you pay for. Don't waste your money. I have hundreds of pictures of weeds blowing in the wind.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Rochelle M. Beste
Reviews.Content: Works great I use it for all kinds of thing. Animals and People. Wanted to know what was roaming around in our barn. It worked we saw a cat and a racoon.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Eric J.
Reviews.Content: the cama is very nice clear pics it takes easy set up very easy, know i can take pics of deer in back yard ,,very nice ill give the camra  and amazon ,,,,,10

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to.
Reviews.Author: Tracy Stanton
Reviews.Content: Slight learning curve getting through the instructions. They seem to assume I had operated a trail cam before. Also, a simple statement regarding amperage and voltage would be nice to have to find a comparable adapter.

Reviews.Title: LCD not working / low quality
Reviews.Author: Marian Mullett
Reviews.Content: I normally pay extra for good quality products.  That is why I bought this camera.  But after 1.5 years, the LCD stopped working, which made it impossible to use.  I suppose they should not have outsourced their LCD and electronics to India.  But I am stuck with this worthless piece of crap.  Keep this in mind as you shop.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy...
Reviews.Author: Ryan S.
Reviews.Content: I bought two and the first one took a picture every minute until the batteries died, they did ship me a new one and then the other stopped taking night pictures after about 4 days. I have a Wildview and have never had a problem with it, So I Returned both of these Moultries and am sticking with the Wildview! Also it's only 5mp and the pictures are not clear, don't buy this product, its a waist of your time and the sellers time.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Teddi
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 13 year old son who uses it independently. He loves to go to the woods every day and down load pics of deer, raccoons. More than 800 images so far, very pleased with pic quality. Still on first set of batteries.

Reviews.Title: Exciting Fun for My Hubby!
Reviews.Author: Teriza349
Reviews.Content: I bought two of the Moultrie A5 Low Glow Game Cameras for my husband for Christmas and he was really pleased with them. They will be useful in many ways. One, will be to monitor our property during the harvest season as we have had all the peaches from our fruit tree stolen. My husband is also a hunter and will have use for the camera in the woods.They look like they are made of high quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Penny R
Reviews.Content: I placed this camera at the end of the driveway to monitor who comes to my house while I am at work. It's amazing to see what goes on.... Love this camera. Love the wildlife shots it has taken. Great quality.

Reviews.Title: Has performed better than expected for the price,
Reviews.Author: Joe Garnett
Reviews.Content: I gave it to my sister for christmas . They live on a mountain in Va. It has taken some wonderful pictures of the various wildlife,and a few stray cats too.Amazing what comes out at night.Easy to set up and good night photos.

Reviews.Title: Game camera
Reviews.Author: James T. Gardner
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera for my wife for Christmas.  She loves it.  It takes great pictures day (color) and night ( black and white).  It will not work with out a memory card.  We like going over the pictures of birds, deer, foxes, skunks and other wildlife.  It is a great way to see what is is in you backyard at night.

Reviews.Title: Very nice Game Camera
Reviews.Author: Cajunreynolds
Reviews.Content: The unit was for my son, He look at the picture every day and enjoy's the way the shot look;Nice unit for the price.This the first one we have so can't it to anything else.would recommend it to others, sharp pictures so far.Thanks, The price was fair.Cajunreynolds

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Ed McCloskey
Reviews.Content: works great. we just had sub zero weather and the camera still worked. pictures are great quality. i'm going to buy another!

Reviews.Title: Serves its purpose well!
Reviews.Author: ISAAC T.
Reviews.Content: The clarity on the photos is pretty good for a 5mp camera. Batterieslife expectancy seems great! (only used for a few months )

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A5
Reviews.Author: Jaye Marie Graham
Reviews.Content: Works well once you understand the steps. The time lapse program is very good and it's range is all you could expect.

Reviews.Title: worked good
Reviews.Author: brett ward
Reviews.Content: It is kinda big so use for security around my cabin it will show up easier than some others, but for game cam on trail or at stand  it works good and for the price it is actually  great. Have to see how c cells hold up compared to aa batteries.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Gerst
Reviews.Content: Excellent!!! This does a wonderful job!  Great price too!  So far we love it!!  Definitely get this one you will not be disappointed

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Gift for Brother-in-laws
Reviews.Author: Linda Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these for my brother-in-laws for Christmas.Items arrived when promised. Package was in great shape. Cameras were just as described.They both are enjoying them very much.I would recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: worked great good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: William weiss
Reviews.Content: Its a slower camera. The key is the set up. Put it in an area were the deer will be standing a little longer

Reviews.Title: Our club has 2 & will get another
Reviews.Author: Bob Bare
Reviews.Content: A very good cameraIt is easy to use and has given us a lot of good pictures. We now have 2 units.

Reviews.Title: My husband was impressed with the price
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Hopkins
Reviews.Content: My husband has been looking for a new game camera and was quite impressed when I told him the price I paid for this one. It was quick to arrive and was in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: rmblackdog72
Reviews.Content: Very good camera for the money, easy to use, great day and night pictures, great battery life. Would recommend, I will by another.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Stacey.M, CA
Reviews.Content: We had a couple of these and a few stealth cams we lost in the rim fire so I started off by getting my husband this one, cant really afford 5 or 6 to start. Its good picture quality and very adjustable for anywhere. My husband said that a plastic ring was missing from the camera housing, could have fallen out during shipping or packing. He said its to keep out moisture we can still use it and put something in there but you may want to check when you get it. Could have been a once only thing, I still like Moultrie they're a GREAT camera!

Reviews.Title: Moultie game camera
Reviews.Author: Sesar
Reviews.Content: I found this camera to be OK. not the best one but it is OK. just what I order.low cost.works well.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: raazrbks
Reviews.Content: Works as described. Great camera for the price. I have several cameras & these are comparable. They have dcent battery life.

Reviews.Title: Bought it on the spur of the moment
Reviews.Author: Pemsit
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on the spur of the moment. Seems like a fair camera, not too much range for night photos. I have caught several animals in my yard with it. The only problem I have with the unit is a bright pixel on the left side.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Earline
Reviews.Content: It is a gift and he loved is and he will put it out when the temp is up.thank you

Reviews.Title: Great Pic's
Reviews.Author: jolyn
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and we were both very impressed with the quality of the pictures it took. Planning on buying another one for next year.

Reviews.Title: First Game Cam, and I LOVE it
Reviews.Author: T. Murray
Reviews.Content: This thing works great.  Takes fantastic pictures, great quality.  My only complaint is that it takes too many pictures, but is that really a complaint?

Reviews.Title: Great choice!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Clark
Reviews.Content: Product was sturdier than I expected for the price I paid. Set up was easy, and instructions were thorough. I would buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: easy to program
Reviews.Author: larry ladner
Reviews.Content: also, takews excellent pictures.  only bad thing is can't erase card with camera.  cvery satisfied espically price wise. good unit.

Reviews.Title: Works well in my application....
Reviews.Author: William Keith Mathison
Reviews.Content: You have to walk through a courtyard to get to the front door of my home and I wanted this camera to keep track of who is coming to the door when we are gone.  It is a well defined space with nothing that could set it off without walking by.  I have a perfect place to put  it that no one typically sees.  I made my own mount and used a string to point the camera in the perfect direction.  I turned it on and tested it with a few pictures and it works great!  Reading other reviews helped me set it up right the first time.  Now if we are gone we actually have time date stamped pictures even showing when the gardener has been there to water the plants!

Reviews.Title: Moultrie a-5
Reviews.Author: J. W.
Reviews.Content: I have two more of these cameras they have been in use all year with no problems they are a good camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Dad was excited
Reviews.Author: rena
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my dad who has many game cameras. The quality for the price made this an easy gift!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for, not much here...
Reviews.Author: Robert Jordan
Reviews.Content: Original review Oct-2013: "Good trail-cam for a reasonable price. I've bought a number of cams over the years, don't spend the bank on them as they all end up stolen at some point."Edited 1-1-2014: Good for price? true for slightly over 3 months.Found DOT (dead on tree). More of that "made in China" high quality goods BS..

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: BIG DADDY
Reviews.Content: Took a pic when it needed to,got some big buck on camera HAVE NOTHING BAD TO SAY ABOUT THIS CAMERA

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: will  parker
Reviews.Content: Great pics. Great battery life. And killer price. Would buy again in the future. Camo job on it is nice too

Reviews.Title: Great price for a good camera
Reviews.Author: SMidd
Reviews.Content: Great price for a beginning game camera. Takes decent pictures and batteries last a long time. Day pictures are of extremely good quality, and night pics are good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great security camera...
Reviews.Author: David J. Brooks "God's Dog"
Reviews.Content: Yes, that's right, I use it as a security camera to take great IR pix at hi or low levels. This camera can easily attach to a tree or other creative place. It will give you the exact date and time "Mr. Sneaky" paid a visit to your property. I will probably purchase a couple more in the future if I can get a good deal.This camera will handle any large capacity SD chip. Just this morning my 4 gig chip recorded 85 pix, all clear. I recommend this camera to anyone looking for a good reliable game/security camera!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I bought /used a trail cam. It was easy to set up and has worked great. So much so I just bought another one a few days ago. Also a nice price

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A5 Low Glow Game Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael gable
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price.  Very simple set-up and operation.  I couldn't have been happier with this model.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: zeb
Reviews.Content: This game camera is very easy to use and extremely affordable. Great for the first time user. Set up is simple.

Reviews.Title: worked great for a while
Reviews.Author: billie bennett
Reviews.Content: it worked great for two weeks, so I bought two more, before they got here the first one died like no batteries.  Sent it off to be repaired free.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: shelley stallings
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dad for hunting and I wanted one that was highly recommended and good. The ratings that I read on this was great and he was very happy to get it.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Works great for the price. Easy to program. Pretty good pictures. It has a nice long strap on it for a variation of tree sizes. Bought a second one for my son

Reviews.Title: So So
Reviews.Author: H. James
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and noticed a lot of failures. I bought 2 of these because they were inexpensive (relatively speaking).  I put them both up and two weeks later only one works. The quality of pictures is ok for a game camera. I just want to see what is coming to my feeder. Its not like I'm gonna frame the pictures. But having one fail is very disappointing. I wouldn't get another one. The other Moultrie products I've owned worked fine and for a long time. In my opinion Moultrie should consider pulling this product before they ruin their good name.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures, even at night.  It doesn't have all of the features of the spendy cameras, but certainly sufficient to get pictures of your deer.  The battery life seems to be pretty good.  The 4 Cs I put in there at the start of the fall are still going strong after taking probably 1500-2000 pictures.

Reviews.Title: ALSOME
Reviews.Author: joseph lorenzo
Reviews.Content: IT TAKES GREAT PICTURES IT DOSE EVERYTHING I WANT GOOD NOT BE HAPPER WILL BUY A COULD MORE IN THE FUTURE

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Norman L. Gillaspie
Reviews.Content: Cost, Name, Experience, Safety, As Well As The Quality Of These Products. Moultrie Are Quality Products Across The Board, thanks

Reviews.Title: had two more expensive d444's I sent back
Reviews.Author: steve ypsi mi "steve"
Reviews.Content: these d444 I sent back, neither would take good pic and movies either, tried them for 3 weeks then sent back.Now these a5's I bought on amazon for $49.00 each have since went up to  $54.00 still a great buy, unlike the D444 these take good clear photo's and movies, super simple except the set up when you Press enter you have to hold it a few seconds to take effect,  took me about 3 try's to figure that out and the am  and pm is way to the left and hard to see, had the am and pm reversed for days,

Reviews.Title: Nice easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: Pugsly
Reviews.Content: We got this camera to use on our deck to see who was coming to our birdfeeders during the night.  Turns out we feed birds by day and raccoons and possums by night!  Great entertainment and worth the price - shoots several seconds of video every time it senses motion.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: good battery life great pics and video with the price i can outfit more cameras on my property.  will be getting more!!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Michael Coatney
Reviews.Content: Really good quality photos for the price. More basic than I expected but still a great buy for the money. Very pleased !! Mike

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Spivey
Reviews.Content: Moultie has come a long way I really have enjoyed this camera, batteries have lasted twice as long as my game spy cam.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Derek Ellington
Reviews.Content: For the price unbelievable camera paid 49.00. Happy Happy! Has taken over 500 pics thus far mostly squirrels, raccoons and deer and one mischievous donkey.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: David J. Christof
Reviews.Content: I am using this camera for taking images of "yard" criters. works great even at night. This would make a good security device.

Reviews.Title: Good for money spent
Reviews.Author: mark lauenstein
Reviews.Content: Camera took good pics for the price. But I received one and got it to the woods only to find out that it would not properly take the sd card. Returned it and new one worked fine

Reviews.Title: Great game camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Pavelitz
Reviews.Content: Works great with a good filed of view in the pictures. Easy to program and setup. Good price for the unit also.

Reviews.Title: what a deal
Reviews.Author: Monty R.
Reviews.Content: One of easies to setup an use takes great pic even at night u wldnt beleave wat u have running around in woods at night.

Reviews.Title: Excellent trail camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Peter A Lawless
Reviews.Content: Purchased two of these A5's. They work great so far. I don't need them to wash my car and cook dinner, I just want good quality photos and that's what I get. Can't beat them for the price. Not sure why you need to spend $100's for a game camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Roxy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my boyfriend for our anniversary in October. We put the camera in the field and have not had any problems at all. At first the bushes in front of the camera were activating it, however we know now to cut the bushes and eliminated the problem. We have gotten CLEAR pictures of deer, squirrels, opossums, and raccoon (all at night). We even got some pictures in the rain that were fairly clear given the conditions.  After seeing how this one has worked, I have now ordered 2 more for Christmas presents for my dad and brother.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Hp-Clays
Reviews.Content: Takes good images and video clips...batteries last longer than I have expected.  Be sure not to setup too high or in high foliage areas or you will end up with wind pictures.  Had a little trouble making sure it was turned on/off, but prob user error

Reviews.Title: Does what I need. WiFi download would be nice.
Reviews.Author: Nathan S.
Reviews.Content: Never used another but works quite well.  I was trying to figure varmint paths to set traps.  A little trouble with glare from sun making pictures.  More night range would be good. Hard to imagine this inexpensive being as good.

Reviews.Title: Nice size camera
Reviews.Author: Jer the fisherman "Dog lover"
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures in th daytime, but not so good at night. But I guess that is the trade off because it is a low glow camera? Night time pictures are black and white. I had a moultrie before that took great pictures at night, (in color)  because the flash was a real flash. The reason I replaced it was the spring that pushed the card out suddenly broke I guess? I had to dig the card out with a knife.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Hollie Erickson
Reviews.Content: So far very impressed.  Have not set up in the field yet.  Easy to set up and use.  Works with all my SD cards.  Doing test shots in the yard, day and night pictures very good.  Quick first photo.  The 1 min delay after that is annoying, but caught me every time with 30 yards, day or night.  Cant wait to get it in the field to see how it works.  Will update after get some good photos.Update.  Worked great in the feild.  Love the video mode.  Saw things you would never see in photos.  Only having four batteries woried me, but they held up a good six months taking video and photos.

Reviews.Title: Good deal, no issues.
Reviews.Author: J. Houck "J Houck"
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is a slam dunk. Easy to setup, good battery life... I've had these out for a month now and not a single hiccup. The resolution on hi is good and even several hundred images will not fill much of an 8GB card. The resolution could be better, but this is a good deal. I have had two of these setup in the woods for 4 weeks with no problems. Actually the only issue I had was a black bear smacked the unit turning it on a slight angle... but nothing broke lol.

Reviews.Title: So-SO
Reviews.Author: JKtheR
Reviews.Content: The housing for the Camera is a little cheap, i wouldnt feel safe leaving it out in the weather. I've only used a camera a handful of time since i got it ( a week ago) and it appears to do what it's supposed to, at least most of the time. I've discovered that there are times the IR LED's won't kick on and I'd end up with wither just an all black video clip or a very poorly lit image. when using it make sure you have good lighting. It appears to have a problem detecting movements as sometimes it doesn't kick on in time to capture the object passing by and turns on right after the object has cleared its viewing area. Other times the motion detection will be so sensitive dust  will make it kick on..... All in all this camera wasn't bad for the money but don't expect anything special.

Reviews.Title: Is it on or off? Damn it was off
Reviews.Author: Darryl J OBrien
Reviews.Content: Great product! Price is good, dose what it advertised. Pictures are clear and timely. Just be careful not to double click it when turning it on and turn it back off. Very easy mistake if in dim light and unable to see screen. It will even show the 10:00 that can be mistaken for the count down. Maybe more of a hold down time off button or one for on and one for off

Reviews.Title: Lots of fun for the money
Reviews.Author: Linda H Maines
Reviews.Content: Having lots of fun with this new toy.  Enjoying the night shots of the local wildlife.  Easy to use and was very easy to setup

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Sensor could be better, but it works, Ive had this up for a week now and have had over 100 pictures but only 3 of any kind of wildlife (deer) the rest were because of the wind blowing trees around the camera and it was picking that up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Quick and easy setup.  Good battery life with photos, leaving it on video setting now though so that could change. Like most cameras under $200, there is some ghosting if the subject is in motion.  For racks on a deer, it depends on how fast the animal is moving if you can "clearly" see the points.  Even in blurry photos though, I've always been able to make out most of the rack to get a point count. Videos are great.  Don't have to worry about "still shot" blur in that case.  For $70, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, great pictures, and GREAT value.
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Moultrie A5, soley based on price, and reviews. Well 1 week into it, and it seems to be a great camera. I was concerned that the camera would trigger excessively with the motion of limbs and leaves on my trail, but that has not been the case at all. The day time pictures are very clear and crisp, and show a clear view for some distance. The night pictures are fairly clear for an IR camera, but if the object is more than 10 or 15 feet, it gets rather fuzzy. All in all, I am very pleased with the camera, and will most likely purchase another.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Pictures
Reviews.Author: Jeff B.
Reviews.Content: Great pictures. No battery meter only a status light. But that is the corner they cut to offer this camera at the price.

Reviews.Title: good clear night and day pics
Reviews.Author: james hanson
Reviews.Content: they function just like I expected good clear night and day pics with clear sharp night pics, easy to use

Reviews.Title: great buy!
Reviews.Author: Shelly557 "Shelly"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. Very easy to set up, and takes nice pictures day and night.

Reviews.Title: A great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Keith Dean Eustice
Reviews.Content: Price is great, it does the job as far as picture quality and it's simple to operate. I have several other much more expensive cameras with more information, etc. and found they have greater problems! I would recommended this camera

Reviews.Title: Excellent pictures, easy to use, and all for a great price.
Reviews.Author: A. Reader "A. Reader"
Reviews.Content: It has been in the field for three weeks.  It has kept dry through some heavy rain.  The last cold snap (lows down to around 28 F) doesn't seem to have bothered it.  Excellent pictures, easy to use, and all for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jordan Mann
Reviews.Content: Great camera good picture quality. Haven't had any problems out of it. I would buy another one today. Recommend it

Reviews.Title: For the money good camra
Reviews.Author: Chuckiv
Reviews.Content: For the price it is a great camera. Took some good pics during bow season. It arrived on time. Easy to program and use. Good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Set up and go
Reviews.Author: Daniel Augustson
Reviews.Content: Works great! I bought 3 and use them for security. Good nite shots too. Easy set up. Just add batteries.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Tim Kelly
Reviews.Content: Gives great pictures, haven't tried video mode yet, but am very pleased with the quality and ease of operation of this field camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Holly Roark
Reviews.Content: Very good camera for the price.  Only issue is the plastic screen that covers the IR LEDs can fog up in certain weather.  Then you just get a foggy picture or a blackout.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: David T.
Reviews.Content: Iam so happy with this item recieved with in days  been using this huntin season works excellent will be buying another soon

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Brian fetzer
Reviews.Content: Works great but indicator light so small it's hard to see from 50ft when setting it up. Overall very satisfied...great product for the money.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: sem
Reviews.Content: The camera is good and takes nice pictures but it is not that user friendly and it should have a 30 sec delay instead of a 1 minute delay.  Overall for the price it is a good camera.

Reviews.Title: nice camera for the prise take good pic. day or night
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: I have three of them but one did not  the first day .witch you were very good at replacing. i would have them a five if not for that one bad one

Reviews.Title: battery life
Reviews.Author: bill jackson
Reviews.Content: I bought two cameras one is perfect, one set of batteries has taken thousands of pictures. The other used two sets of batteries on just a few hundred pictures. I sent it back to the mfg.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Bill Woodard
Reviews.Content: Love this game camera, so far it's performed  very well and it's easy to use!  I'll be buying more of these.

Reviews.Title: Nice trail camera for the price
Reviews.Author: rmthunder "rmthunder"
Reviews.Content: Takes good day and night pictures and 10 second videos, good battery life. Comes with a nice strap for mounting to a treeI will probably buy another.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and use. I just use it in my back yard to spot urban wildlife.  It works day or night.  So far, I have images of deer, including a buck taken at 11 AM, a woodchuck, rabbits, squirrels, fox, a cat, and numerous birds.

Reviews.Title: It work good and I like the data and time stamp on picturs.
Reviews.Author: Fishing Nut
Reviews.Content: So far it has work good for me, we will see how it holds up. Haven't had it long enough to give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: 5.0 megapixel Low Glow infrared game camera
Reviews.Author: FrankT "Frank"
Reviews.Content: Nomenclature on header is wrong, pic is right.  This for $50 is a good middle of the road cam, I use the M-80,s also and they are great, this does the job cheaper and holds up well.  I bought 2 more to fill in between my good cams.

Reviews.Title: Decent Game Camera
Reviews.Author: Fishing "Harv"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to see what has been tearing up my lawn.  It worked well enough to tell me that 2 raccoons were the culprits.  I didnt want to trap if they were Skunks!  Overall I'm happy with it for what it cost me.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, but too sensitive
Reviews.Author: Ryan McIntosh
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures, its batteries last long, and it is really easy to program. However, it is way too sensitive and the slightest sway of grass will set it off.  The biggest, and only real issue, is that you can't adjust the sensitivity.

Reviews.Title: As good as it gets
Reviews.Author: Tribute
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera is as good as it gets. Had it up 2 months now have over 6700 pictures from it, day and night, all good as expected. As good as any I have had.

Reviews.Title: INFRARED PICS BLURRY, OTHERWISE OK
Reviews.Author: DaveintheBurgh
Reviews.Content: IT is an excellent camera for the price paid. I used it once so far, daylight pic's perfect, nightime are sort of blurred and I was unable tocount the # of points on the antlers

Reviews.Title: my spy cam
Reviews.Author: lawrence  smith
Reviews.Content: Item was received fast no problem with item at this time. Looking to purchase at least one more. Placed in hot spot got some decent pics with it.

Reviews.Title: Great game camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy L.
Reviews.Content: Have had this up at my camp for the last 3 weeks, has worked great and the picture quality seems to be pretty good.  Definitely can't complain for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and the pictures are great!  We bought two and have them both out for about a week and have a ton of pictures,  the batteries are holding up good and will take any kind of sd card so far.  I have not had any problems!

Reviews.Title: Its not as good as some of the others
Reviews.Author: Thomas M Purzycki
Reviews.Content: The same time I bought this one I bought a Covert camera also. The Moultrie is 5 mb , the pictures are fine but it dosnt have a big range of setting , the trigger dosnt seem to trigger as much as you would expect.  I also bought a Covert camera which has a big range of settings and 3 shot burst option.For a Basic Cameral the Moultrie is find and does take reasonable pictures, If you cant afford a better camera then this one will do the job just fine

Reviews.Title: Good game camera at good price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I shopped a lot of game cameras to find one for a gift to my brother that wasn't going to break my pocket book. The feedback is that it is working well photographing rabbits just in his backyard. He'll use it for deer hunting in November in northern MN.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: louquel butler
Reviews.Content: works great for what i am looking for picture quality is amazing, not sure how it drains the battery my sd card was filled w pics.  setting could use more options but for the price im very happy going to buy more

Reviews.Title: Easy to use great pics
Reviews.Author: SHARON G.
Reviews.Content: Set it up last night and saw the skunks this morning !  Quality is amazing and clear even at night.

Reviews.Title: good cam
Reviews.Author: Roger pennington
Reviews.Content: It work's great. Take's good pic and easy to set  up. I have two more moultrie cams i want use any thing else

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A-5 Camera
Reviews.Author: magoo
Reviews.Content: Very good camera for the money!  I have already captured pics of deer a raccoon and a fox .  Simple to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Mark Dudley
Reviews.Content: It's been a few weeks in the woods and it's working great. No photos of deer but lots of photos of other wildlife.Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great starter camera
Reviews.Author: justin nally
Reviews.Content: This is my first trail camera I have owned. I have used different ones in the past my friends have had and this one seems just as nice. Great day and night pictures. I had deer on my camera the first night I put it out along with a couple other smaller animals. The only thing I dont like is that the smallest delay is 1 minute. This would be a top notch camera if it had a 15 or 30 second delay. I will order more for my land for sure! As for the video setting I have not used it but I will and update at a later date.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: lnchbx
Reviews.Content: Great working cameras great pics fast trigger good detail I would recomend this camera to anyone that needs a good camera

Reviews.Title: excellent entry level trail camera
Reviews.Author: James Hartman
Reviews.Content: brand came highly recommended.easy to set up.needs c batteries (not something I had laying around house when it arrived)offers several different time settings.love the time stamp/date stamp on the pictures

Reviews.Title: just right
Reviews.Author: harlan mccaslin
Reviews.Content: great easy to use small and compact fits into my pack i would tell all to use it fits my budget

Reviews.Title: A-5 5MP Game camera
Reviews.Author: Live to Read
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this camera , but I am having trouble getting it set up. I keep forgetting that I have to turn it on every time I take out the card.  The pictures are clear.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: dodgerblue247
Reviews.Content: This camera has been a great purchase at ~$60. I bought it to scout deer prior to hunting season, and it worked as an inexpensive game camera just as advertised. The only qualm that I have is the long picture delay which makes it tough to scout at game crossings, but a little planning and good placements does make it possible. The camera does not come with a USB cable, and does make a very quiet click when the IR flash goes off. Overall, nothing to complain about when you get a high quality trail camera with great picture quality for less than 70 bucks.

Reviews.Title: good price
Reviews.Author: eldahsr01
Reviews.Content: This camera works good. I use cables to lock it to a tree. Photos come out okay. I think maybe it takes some photos of shadows though. Time / date stamp and moon phase. Wish it showed temp though. Battery life is good so far.

Reviews.Title: I found out who was raiding my garden.
Reviews.Author: David Lisowski
Reviews.Content: I caught a groundhog near my garden but even after that I was still being raided by something at night. I had even put an electric fence around the garden and still the tomatoes were getting destroyed. I put this out for three days and then I found an opossum climbing the fence in the night. Solution - possums will go inside my Havaheart traps, unlike the ground hogs and I have no fear of catching Mr Skunk inside the garden. So I targeted him.  Mr Possum is now far away.  I want to use this also to see what else is cutting through my yard at night besides deer and possibly coyotes.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: jamie
Reviews.Content: works perfect batteries last a long time fairly easy set up . good pictures day and night. I would recomend it

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I have 3 camera and have just purchased 4 more. You can't set the sensitivity so you end up with more pictures of the woods or field but it's well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Moultrie A-5 camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Henry
Reviews.Content: camera functions just as suggested and for a great price. Probably the best camera for the money on the market. Takes pretty good day and night pictures. It gets the job done

Reviews.Title: It meets my needs.
Reviews.Author: elmo f. smalley
Reviews.Content: Go to ;  [...]  I may have to find another tree, the morning sun is washing out some photos.I like it.

Reviews.Title: Get what you you pay for.
Reviews.Author: KJ
Reviews.Content: My first camera was defective and Fat Boy Tools were great about replacing it quickly. The camera works like it should for the price. I would have liked for it to take pictures and videos quicker than one minute ( like 15 to 30 seconds ), but have to upgrade to the next higher camera, at higher price to get it .

Reviews.Title: Moultrie Infrared Game Camera
Reviews.Author: Don Huxford
Reviews.Content: Seems to work OK so far, needs C type batteries, hope it lasts longer than other components needing C type power source.  Daylight mode OK,  wondering about infrared mode.  Used couple times on still photos, no pictures taken, wondering does it work ?

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Roy Charles Hamlin III
